extension.summary: Python package for providing Mozilla's CA Bundle.
Paquete de Python para proporcionar el paquete CA de Mozilla.
extension.description: Certifi is a carefully curated collection of Root Certificates for validating the trustworthiness of SSL certificates while verifying the identity of TLS hosts. It has been extracted from the Requests project.
Certifi es una colección cuidadosamente seleccionada de certificados raíz para validar la confiabilidad de los certificados SSL mientras se verifica la identidad de los hosts TLS
